blocks.heading: Custom AI Solutions, **Expertly Implemented.**
blocks.description: Our solutions go beyond basic automation to create real business value, turning AI into a genuine intellectual partner for your specific business challenges.

blocks.heading: From quick prototypes to secure AI models, **we make AI work for you.**
blocks.description:
AI can be overwhelming, but we make it simple. Our consultants analyze your systems and recommend practical AI solutions to improve efficiency, automate tasks, and extract insights from data.

Get expert guidance to integrate AI where it matters most.

mediaConfiguration.altText: The Future of Business with AI: Automation, Intelligence, and Customer Relations

cards.heading: Intelligent automation, precisely applied
cards.description: We build automation that cuts through complexity and adapts to your specific business needs. No generic solutions, just practical AI that solves real problems.

cards.heading: Secure, compliant implementation
cards.description: AI models offer incredible capabilities but require proper security and compliance guardrails. We implement safeguards that protect your customer data, ensuring your solutions stay both powerful and compliant.

cards.heading: Trusted expertise at scale
cards.description: From operational efficiency to customer experience, we scale AI solutions that deliver measurable results. Our team brings enterprise-level expertise to organizations of all size.

blocks.heading: **YakShaver:** Our AI Agent in Action
blocks.description:
At SSW, we don't just talk about AI—we build it. YakShaver is our AI solution that automates work item creation, proving how AI can streamline repetitive dev tasks.

Beyond the typical chatbot, YakShaver shows how AI capabilities can transform development workflows.

It's the same approach we bring to your projects, practical AI that delivers real results.

mediaConfiguration.altText: YakShaver - AI to make the perfect PBI in 30 seconds

blocks.heading: Tech wisdom from the trenches
blocks.body: At SSW, we’ve been knee-deep in projects for years: debugging giant solutions, fixing game-stopping bugs, and staying on the cutting edge. No guesswork, just proven tips that help you build better software.

cards.heading: The Year of the AI Agent: Automation to Intelligence
cards.description: Dive into the future of AI with Ulysses Maclaren in this insightful SSW User Group session! Explore the exciting shift from automation to true AI intelligence and discover what the year of the AI agent holds for developers.

cards.heading: Choosing the Right AI Model? GitHub Models Makes It Easy!
cards.description: Confused about selecting the perfect AI model? Join Isaac Lombard and Caleb Williams as they explore how GitHub Models simplifies the process! Discover the ease of finding and utilizing AI models for your projects in this quick guide.

cards.heading: Creating Multi-Language AI-Powered Apps w/ Rust, Python & Blazor
cards.description: Discover how to build AI-powered applications that speak multiple languages! Join TJ Gokken in this User Group session as he dives into the world of multi-language app development using Rust, Python, and Blazor. Learn practical techniques and best practices for creating global-ready AI solutions.

cards.heading: How to supercharge a company with AI
cards.description: Supercharge your company with AI!  🚀  See how SSW transformed their business and Tina CMS using practical AI strategies, from customer support chatbots to AI-powered product features.  Discover actionable tips to implement AI

cards.altText: AI Powered Navigation for French Payroll Expert
cards.heading: AI Powered Navigation for French Payroll Expert
cards.description: Join us as we explore the journey of French Payroll Expert (FPE), a company that provides payroll services from A to Z to foreign companies working in France. Discover how integrating an AI-powered chatbot, developed in collaboration with SSW, has revolutionized customer service, addressing common queries efficiently and accurately.

blocks.heading: Talk to us about your AI project today
blocks.description: Connect with our Account Managers to discuss how we can help.
